author: StigRS
post_text: April 25, 2017 at 9:50 AM#1I`ve been using a macro with faderpage +, select executor 1, go executor cue 1 as my "next song" macro.This way I can just change the sorting of the faderpages if the setlist changes.What I`m looking for is a macro that looks up the faderpage for a specific song, no matter what faderpage it is on.

posts.post_text: April 25, 2017 at 11:51 AM#2label your pages with the songnameCodeFaderpage "Rai Rai"
